name: Feed Eve
description: Next-Gen VR Action-Shooter experience. Battle hordes of zombies in extremely realistic environments and varying exciting game modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 / Amd Equivalent Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 / Amd Equivalent Storage: 10 GB available space
